section_1.processor_content: The educational institutions that use our services and their authorized legal representatives.
section_2.title: 2. Purpose of the Agreement
section_2.content: This Agreement establishes the conditions under which Plataforma Astral processes personal data on behalf of educational institutions, complying with Law 19.628 on Personal Data Protection and complementary regulations applicable in Chile.
section_3.title: 3. Definitions
section_3.personal_data_desc: Any information relating to identified or identifiable natural persons.
section_3.processing_desc: Operations performed on personal data, including collection, storage, use, circulation and deletion.
section_3.sensitive_data_desc: Information that reveals racial origin, political opinions, religious, philosophical or moral convictions, union affiliation, information regarding health, sexual life, genetic or biometric data.
section_3.security_measures_desc: Technical, organizational and legal procedures designed to protect personal data against loss, alteration, unauthorized access or unauthorized processing.
section_4.title: 4. Categories of Processed Data
section_4.user_data_items: Full name, RUN/RUT, date of birth
section_5.title: 5. Purposes of Processing
section_5.purposes: Manage access and use of the educational platform
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
Improve the quality of educational services
section_6.title: 6. Controller's Obligations
section_6.obligations: Process data only according to documented instructions
Implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures
Assist the processor in responding to ARCO rights requests
Delete or return data upon service termination
section_7.title: 7. Processor's Obligations
section_7.obligations: Provide clear instructions on data processing
Obtain necessary consents before transferring data
Notify changes that may affect data security
Cooperate in the implementation of security measures
section_8.title: 8. Security Measures
section_8.technical_measures: Data encryption in transit and at rest
section_9.title: 9. International Data Transfers
section_9.content: Data is processed and stored exclusively on servers located in Chile. No international transfers of personal data are made without the express consent of the data subject and adequate safeguards in accordance with applicable legislation.
section_10.title: 10. Duration and Termination
section_10.content: This agreement remains in effect as long as the contractual relationship between Plataforma Astral and the educational institution lasts. Upon termination of service, data will be deleted or returned according to the processor's instructions, unless there is a legal obligation to retain it.
section_11.title: 11. Liability and Indemnification
section_11.content: Each party shall be responsible for the violations it commits under this agreement. In case of claims by third parties for improper data processing, the parties will cooperate to resolve the situation and cover associated costs as appropriate.
section_12.title: 12. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
section_12.content: This agreement is governed by Chilean legislation, particularly Law 19.628 on Personal Data Protection. Any dispute will be resolved in the competent courts of Santiago, Chile.
section_13.title: 13. Modifications
section_13.content: Any modification to this agreement must be made in writing and have the approval of both parties. Significant changes will be notified with at least 30 days' notice.
